text: cng klaw theid(muhammad) wa phracea khxng chan di thrng sang hı mi khwam yutithrrm læa phwk cea cng phin hı trng sung bıhna khxng phwk cea n thuk «masyid læa cng win wxn tx phraxngkh nı thana phu mx bxi ba dah thanghlay dæ phraxngkh doy brisuththicı chen deiyw kab thi phraxngkh di thrng bangkeid phwk cea tæ ræk nan phwk cea k ca klab pi
